item.title: Professional Information
item.description: About me I am Andres Jeronimo Escobar Giraldo, a Systems Engineer with an insatiable thirst for knowledge and the strong conviction that we can leverage data we obtain from the world to transform it My Professional Profiles Platform URL GitHub: https://github.com/TheTecj LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jeroescobar

item.title: Real Estate Dashboard
item.description: This project is a Streamlit dashboard where investors can analyse their personal protfolios and future aquisitions This dashboard includes two sections: General portfolio In this section we habe general portfolio information: net value, KPIs and a map to analysis geogephical information of properties Individual analysis In this section investors can get specific metrics for aquired and non aquired properties, the property to analyze can be selected in a dropdown menu, the properties shown in this can be filtered using filters located in site’s sidebar.
